channel.title: Non-NPC luring
channel.description: I am making a range training bit, and there is a hedge, and then an iron dragon. How would i make it so that the iron dragon doesn't walk through the hedge? Here's a pic of what happens: [IMG]http://img511.imageshack.us/img511/3183/irondragonlured.png[/img]

item.title: Non-NPC luring
item.dc:creator: @faded_vision Faded Vision
item.description:
@faded_vision wrote:

you mean to remove npc noclipping.

theres many ways to do this but it seems no one decided to make a tutorial for it on these forums, there is one on another website
that we are not aloud to say.

Try google.

Read full topic
